GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on curseg->alloc_type

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 0748a0f7dcb9d9dddc80302d73ebcecef6782ef0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: fix to do sanity check on curseg->alloc_type
